author: Special Correspondent
text:
Four members of a family consumed poison at their residence in Kallambal under Silaiman police limits on Thursday.

The head of the family, A. Murugan (40), succumbed at Government Rajaji Hospital (GRH) here.

Police said that the neighbours found Murugan, his wife Aaye (30) and her two teenage daughters, Swathi and Subena, lying unconscious in the house in the forenoon.

They were rushed to the GRH, where Murugan, an autorickshaw driver, succumbed around 12.45 p.m. The eldest daughter of the couple was married off to a man in Mangulam a couple of years back.
title: Family of four consume poison
